entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sparwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:08 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sparwood Airport 11:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -16.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 56 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -23.1°C
Wind: ESE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
